entry.title: Friday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening except southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
